description:
Whey protein is the WORLD'S NUMBER ONE most popular selling workout supplement.

Yet, when most people buy it because of someone's recommendation, they have no idea what they are buying or how to use it for maximum results.

In this 90 minute FREE course, not only will you will learn all of the incredible muscle-building benefits of this complete protein, I will ensure that you will finish this course more educated than your local personal trainer.

Not only will I give you science-based advice (all references included), I will also draw upon practical examples of "real world" whey protein packaging so you are able to apply science to real-world purchasing decisions.

After completing this course,

  • You will know exactly what you are buying and why you are buying it.
  • You will learn how to read nutrition labels so you know exactly where you are spending your money (and you may even SAVE money!).
  • You will learn the basic concepts of whey protein, whey peptides, and other scientific principles to complete your understanding of the practical advice given in this course.
  • You will be given practical strategies backed by peer-reviewed scientific research for calculating how much protein you need everyday to meet your training goals.
  • You will know exactly how much protein you need post-workout and within what time frame after your workout.
  • You will know precisely where the science stands for high protein dieting and kidney and liver function.
  • You can learn with confidence knowing that advice and concepts in this course are all backed by the latest in peer-reviewed scientific research, with citations included throughout.


Enrol in this course today and start learning what I wish I had access to many years ago when I started my fitness journey!
title: Protein Education Series: The Complete Guide to Whey Protein
